column8: k0R9KL_ITKQReport: Mahathir backs Anwar for PMPublished on Jul 6, 2017Former premier Dr Mahathir Mohamad has thrown his support behind PKR de facto leader Anwar Ibrahim as prime minister, if he can obtain a pardon from the King.
Vote for jailed PM or to be jailed PMYou decide
Mahathir know anwar / PH will never win that is why he said so
If Anwar became PM, then he is the real legend. He can't be legend if he get promoted to PM under BN. He should thanks Tun for this.
